name: Doki Doki But an Old Dog Tries To Learn New Tricks and The Literature Club Tries to Help It: A Dog Story
storyline: The infamous MC (stupider than usual) brings his very... special dog to the Literature Club. The girls decide to teach him new tricks, since the ones the dog knows are pretty old. What will the dog learn? Will the MC be amazed that his beloved dog learns amazing new tricks? Find out in this wholesome dog story!
summary: Doki Doki Dog Mod is a fun and light mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that brings a big and adorable change: dogs!

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: MC Has A Strange Doggo!!!!(DDLC A Dog Story MOD)
